column4: hey, anyone know how i can get my local dns entries to be recognised by ubuntu 9.04?
i have a linksys nslu2 that has the dns name 'slug'... on my new ubuntu though, i can't use this hostname (only the ip works)
to be honest, i'm not quite sure how the dns entry is being created though :D
In /etc/hosts add a new line with: 192.168.1.X slug
